text: Halo Khan Ardalan () was one of the most famous Ardalan rulers in sixteenth and seventeenth century. He was ruling the autonomous Ardalan state from 1590 to 1616.Ruhani, B. M. "History of Famous Kurdish People," Sorush, Tehran, 1993[in Persian]. He is known as the most powerful Ardalan ruler. He has been ruling over a large part of Kurdistan and his state was majorly independent from Safavid and Ottoman empire.Salehi, L.
